thread.title: POLL: Which WR steps up in 2017?
thread.title_full: POLL: Which WR steps up in 2017?

title: POLL: Which WR steps up in 2017?
text:
POLL: Which WR steps up in 2017? Which UGA WR is worthy of a more prominent role in 2017? Slot to Georgia Links (Photo: Jake Rowe, 247Sports) 
Georgia has bolstered its wide receiver depth after some lean years, and it looks like quarterbacks Jacob Eason and Jake Fromm will have some talented pass catchers moving forward. 
(What's next for the Bulldogs? Make sure you're in the loop -- take a few moments to sign up for our FREE Bulldogs Newsletter! ) 
With the early departure of Isaiah McKenzie, the team's leading receiver in 2016, for the 2017 NFL Draft, it is fair to wonder which player or players will step up. Which wideout currently on the roster or arriving this summer will make a compelling case to start? 
Which wide receiver would you like to see step into a more prominent role or take the next step in their development for the Bulldogs in 2017?
